description: Use pet-safe balms or booties to protect your pet’s paws from salt, ice, and cold surfaces during winter walks.
Pets can get dehydrated in winter too! Ensure fresh water is always available and not frozen in outdoor bowls.
Keep pet beds away from drafts and elevate them off cold floors to ensure your pet stays warm and cozy.

tipTitle: Limit Outdoor Time in Extreme Cold
description: Avoid long walks during extreme cold. Shorter, more frequent outings help prevent frostbite and hypothermia.
